name: Joe Pasillas
coverLetter: I have a little bit of experience trimming with my grandfather in the past years. I'm a college student looking for some work in a field that I know I'll be happy doing with. I have weekends free, Monday and Wednesday im free after 3pm, Friday Im free before 2pm and after 3pm. On Tuesdays and Thursdays I am free from 12pm to 5pm. If I am in consideration, I'll work as efficiently as possible for you.
